actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize a study of the struggle for American Independence within the Northern Frontier.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) identify and report to specified congressional committees on potential means to preserve and interpret the cultural resources in the Northern Frontier associated with the American Revolution; and (2) propose alternatives for cooperation in the preservation and interpretation of such resources. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To authorize a study of the struggle for American Independence within the Northern Frontier.
